events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your resume and experience.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to assist you through the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed today, and your qualifications align well with our software engineering requirements.
Thank you for promptly responding to the screening questions and providing detailed explanations about your engineering projects.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our development team for May 7th at 2 PM to assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
